document.full_text: andy murray was booed by the mainly french crowd at the monte carlo masters for using drop shots in his 6-3 6-3 third-round win over france's injured gilles simon on thursday.
document.title: andy murray booed in monte carlo for using drop shot
lines_and_colors: andy murray was booed by the mainly french crowd at the monte carlo masters for using drop shots in his 6-3 6-3 third-round win over france's injured gilles simon on thursday.
